text: Because out of the heart proceed malignant thoughts, murders, adulteries, fornications,This is one of a number of places where ‘adultery’ and ‘fornication’ both occur in a list of sins—it is clear that they are distinct in meaning, and so ‘fornication’ does not include ‘adultery’; and so to render ‘fornication’ as ‘sexual sin/immorality’ is misleading. thefts, false witness, blasphemies.
